bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Etiological Agent. identical with shi ren 螫人 , to sting a person. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry ren shi 人屎 quoting Qian jin bei ji fang 千金備急方 25: 治蛇齧方：人屎厚塗，帛裹即消 , “Recipe to cure snake bite: Apply a thick layer of human feces and bandage with silk cloth. This will dissolve it”. writes: 毒蛇咬螫：人屎厚封之，即消 , “If someone was bitten/stung by a venomous snake: wrap a thick layer of human feces around it, and it will dissolve”.
